about_the_game:
The official digital art collection for HuniePop 2: Double Date includes all of the concept, in-game and promotional artwork created for the game in high resolution, full source quality, uncensored and without any logos or watermarks.

Among all the artwork in this collection are over 30 beautifully rendered CG photos (in all variants), over 25 hand-painted environment backgrounds (in all daytimes) and all 15 girls' in-game artwork displayed with all of their alternate outfits and hairstyles. You'll also get all of our cute chibi sprites and charms, character profiles, cut content and more.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files. To quickly access these files right-click HuniePop in your Steam library and select "Properties". From there select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including frequent nudity, sexual dialog, sexual scenes/scenarios, references to drug/alcohol use, and anime boobies.

Among all the artwork in this collection are over 30 beautifully rendered CG photos (in all variants), over 25 hand-painted environment backgrounds (in all daytimes) and all 15 girls' in-game artwork displayed with all of their alternate outfits and hairstyles. You'll also get all of our cute chibi sprites and charms, character profiles, cut content and more.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files. To quickly access these files right-click HuniePop in your Steam library and select "Properties". From there select the "Local Files" tab and click the "Browse Local Files" button.
